header.headertext: MARSHALLED LIST OF AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN COMMITTEE
**** DELETE ORDER OF CONSIDERATION **** Clauses x to xx Schedule x Clauses xx and xx Schedule x Clauses xx to xx
[Amendments marked * are new or have been altered]

text.quote: 000: Clause 2, lord Berkeley gives notice of his intention to oppose the Question that Clause 2 stand part of the Bill.
1*: Clause 5, page 4, line 21, at end insert—

“(8) An order designating a harbour authority shall not be made unless the Welsh Ministers, the Secretary of State or the Scottish Ministers, as the case may be, are satisfied that the harbour authority has in place appropriate procedures for resolving any disputes that may arise in relation to a proposed harbour direction.”
000: Clause 5, lord Berkeley gives notice of his intention to oppose the Question that Clause 5 stand part of the Bill.
